content.description:
Slither up the easy chimney/corner and onto the face above.  Snake along the leftmost weakness past 4 bolts, and sidewind right past a small roof to shared anchors.

The climbing is well protected and sequential!
content.protection:
4 bolts + gear + 2 bolt anchor.

Gear beta:

A hand to fist-sized cam (#3.5-4 Friend) for the initial corner and a wide, finger piece (red Alien) in the crack below the first bolt are required. A thin fingers piece for the highest roof and another large hand piece at the bottom will sew it up tight!
content.location: This is the leftmost route on the Terraphile. See the photo.

content.description:
Stairstep up a short, pink wall right of the first bolt to the main slab.  Place a 1 inch cam (red Metolius TCU) in the crack up and left (below the second bolt). Follow the line up and right, using the arete near the last bolt.  Step left to shared anchors.

The most fun can be had by following the bolted panels directly.

The bolt spacing at the top is safe but certainly will keep you awake!
content.protection: 5 bolts, a 1 inch cam and a 2 bolt anchor.
content.location: This is the second route from the left.

pathTokens: South Fork of St. Vrain Canyon
